bibl.title: From the Roman Red Sea to beyond the Empire: Egyptian Ports and their Trading Partners. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Paper presented at the Annual International Egyptological Colloquium 2011, entitled Mariners and Traders: Connections between the Red Sea Littoral, Arabia and Beyond, held at The British Museum on 2 August 2011. - The Red Sea ports of Myos Hormos and Berenike. - Connecting the Red Sea: trade goods and trade sites. - Egyptian pottery in long-distance Indian Ocean trade.

bibl.title: British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan

bibl.seg: 241 Bérénice (mer Rouge) Désert Oriental Mer Rouge Myos Hormos 730 870
Tomber Roberta, From the Roman Red Sea to beyond the Empire: Egyptian Ports and their Trading Partners. Avec résumé en anglais.

British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan 18 (2012) pp. 201-215, 6 figg. n./bl. et coul. [Uniquement accessible en ligne, en téléchargement gratuit: < http://www.britishmuseum.org/research/publications/online_journals/bmsaes/issue_18/tomber.aspx >.]

Paper presented at the Annual International Egyptological Colloquium 2011, entitled Mariners and Traders: Connections between the Red Sea Littoral, Arabia and Beyond, held at The British Museum on 2 August 2011. - The Red Sea ports of Myos Hormos and Berenike. - Connecting the Red Sea: trade goods and trade sites. - Egyptian pottery in long-distance Indian Ocean trade.
